runs.comm: a huge roar greets him as he reaches the wicket, offering a wideish one which Bopara leaves alone
very good delivery on middle-and-leg, Bopara defends solidly
England are underway with a wide down the leg side
Bopara clamps down on it on the front foot to defend, and Wright calls him through for a single. Excellent, sharp run
another good, straight delivery on the off stump which Wright, facing his first ball, defends
and again he blocks this on the front foot
nudged to leg
good one - cuts back sharply and hits him on the body. The Indian fans love that
calmly guided out to the off side - a good start by RP here
down the leg side, Dhoni appeals as Wright tries to flick - and about 30,000 Indians also appeal around the ground
got him! The roof's come off at Lord's as Wright tries to pull a delivery a little too full, and top-edges it, and leg slip (leg slip?) makes excellent ground to take a diving catch
on his legs - a touch of swing for RP
again on his legs, he steals a single
four to England! Bopara's flicked this very fine, just waiting for it nicely
a better line this time, and he comes forward to defend solidly
clipped neatly off his toes
no no no - don't bowl there to this man. Clipped for four
a squirty drive to mid-off, slightly mistimed - but that's a horrid mess by the fielder. In fact, they get two with another misfield!
timed to mid-on, who fields it cleanly and receives ironic cheers and applause from a crowd almost bubbling over with excitement
India need to sort their lines out here. Another leg-stump delivery flipped for a single
this climbs on Pietersen more than he thought, but he remained in control of this strong pull shot, straight to deep square leg
short, Bopara pulls it from way wide of the off stump - he did well to reach this, and did very well to time it so well. Quality shot from Bopara, placing it beautifully
clamps forward, defending solidly
plays and misses to one angled across Bopara. I much prefer that line
a big shout by Dhoni and the bowler but it pitched outside leg
starts with one just outside off which Pietersen clips to leg. Fullish delivery
Pietersen's down the pitch and flicks this powerfully, elegantly for four through midwicket. Fantastic stroke. Stepped across to the off side, too, as is his wont
a firm foot forward, driving to short midwicket
steps outside off and flicks to mid-on. They steal a single. Better ball - fuller and straighter
fabulous, crunching cover-drive but straight to the fielder. He absolutely nailed that!
gone for a pull - he's not quite middled it but it's still good enough to go sailing for six! That's quietened the Indians down in the crowd
pushed, and mistimed, to mid-off
down the pitch - oh yes! That's four more! Pietersen at his best. Charges the bowler, steps outside leg and fairly thwacks him down the ground
cracked square
flicked to leg
pulls and misses - good slower ball
fuller delivery, and the big Boppa drives to mid-on
a quality cover-drive - smashed it on the up, inside out for four
Bopara defends
goes for a sweep and rather chops down on it, speeding it to fine leg
squeezed out to the off side
another sweeping-chip to deep backward square
four - Pietersen 1-0 Yuvraj. Down the leg side and swept powerfully past short fine-leg
short, Bopara tries to cut and misses it. Nice take by Dhoni
straight delivery, flat and quick, and it's pushed back to the bowler
edged through the vacant slip and they pick up three
Pietersen stands tall, whipping this without great power
Bopara drives to cover. Good stop by Rohit Sharma
flicked to leg
Bopara steps to leg, cutting - a very late but forceful cut
flighted this time - nice, loopy delivery and they get a single out to deep extra cover
sweeps this hard to deep square leg but, again, just for a single. India'll be happy with that
a dart speared into his pads, and it rebounds out to the off side
flicks this fine past short fine-leg - deep backwards square leg should cut this off. Or not! Oh dear, oh dear - Zaheer's made a complete hash of it. Four more!
clatters it to mid-off - and another misfield, by Raina at mid-off, allows Pietersen through for a single
short, wide and cut very hard - really hard indeed, but fortunately for India there's a sweeper on the boundary
that's a good line, just outside off, and Bopara is right behind it in defence
waits and waits for it, sweeping...but just for a single
clipped orthodoxly to the leg side
very, very close to bowling him! Superb ball, spinning back sharply and Bopara went for a cut but missed it...and Dhoni also shelled it behind
sweeps behind square
flicked to mid-on, who is deep
driven out to the off side
flipped down to long-on
goes for a sweep but misses it
bowled him! Bopara stepped to leg but Jadeja saw him coming, fired it in full and fast and that's the end of Bopara
driven to long-off
leaves this alone outside off
nudged to leg for a quick single
back cut past point, well fielded by Gambhir on the boundary
excellent hook shot, he timed that surprisingly well, but there's a deep midwicket out to prevent four
guided out to the off side
thick outside edge flies down to third man and they get two
that's a wide down the leg side
quicker ball and flicked to leg
shorter delivery and Pietersen late cuts
fuller delivery and he clips it to leg
goes for a sweep, paddling it around the corner
at last! That was absolutely huge. A full toss and Pietersen clumped it over midwicket, high, high in the air and it sails into the Grandstand for a massive six!
he's gone! Pietersen doesn't like it, but he has to go - he went for another slog but was rapped full on the pads, bang in front
chopped to point - good stop
defended out to the off side and he roars "no"
pulled, and pulled powerfully, but straight to the fielder
a bouncer - good thinking by Sharma - and it's nudged off his chest
pushed out to the off side
an ugly shovel. Tried to drive through cover but his bottom hand came off the bat and the ball worked its devilish way through the leg side
a pointless prod to mid-off. Very well bowled, though - not much he could do with that
Shah tries to put the bowler off by standing outside leg, then shuffles across to flick it
faster ball on his legs
timed out to cover. Cheers greet the zero
down the pitch, Mascarenhas - whose name I can now spell almost 10 times out of 10 on a good day - flicks it to mid-on
squeezed out to the off side but, again, it's just four off that over
off his pads, another limp single
straight ball nudged behind square
shorter delivery outside off which sits up nicely for Shah, but his pull only yields a single
now that's a bit of humpty from Mascarenhas. Shorter delivery and it's pulled powerfully - seriously powerfully, for four
fuller this time, and pushed to cover
short, and down the leg side, and that's four. Poor by Sharma - mixing some cracking deliveries with some tosh.
down the leg side and Dhoni whips off the bails. Looks very tight to me...but replays show he's safe
down the pitch. He doesn't look a natural dancer, Mascarenhas, or a charger-down-the-pitch
tries to sweep but it comes off the pads
short, wide and he slaps it square for four. Good, crisp stroke and England need several more of those
smashed back to the bowler
flipped to long-on
very full - excellent delivery and an excellent spell
flicked to fine leg
he's holed out to deep midwicket! Well, he tried to go for a big slog, but couldn't get it over the fielder
crisply swept (or paddled) to fine leg
a flighty, loopy delivery outside off. Collingwood tries a deft little reverse sweep and utterly, utterly misses it
swept - England have swept a lot today! - and it lands short of deep square leg
runs here. Full toss, he gets bat on it and that's a blight on an otherwise good over from Singh
lines up a slog to long-on and they scramble two - but only just! Impressive dive from Collingwood
but Collingwood's got him away here - a flog, a real shovel to the leg side, as though he was scything grass in a field
a full toss smudged to long-on and they get two. Good running
tries to sweep but it's a leg-side wide
got him! Not sure what Collingwood was attempting there - a reverse sweep to a very full delivery on middle stump. Ergo, that's about as plumb as you can get
good start, punching this forcefully down the ground
full toss banged to long-on - good running, though, and they grab two. Foster dived a metre or more!
nice and full and he can only get a single
tries a reverse sweep and he gets a single, dropping the bat in the process - Mascarenhas is finally back on strike
smacked to leg but brilliantly fielded by Zaheer at midwicket, flinging out his right hand
got him! Short and slow delivery, Foster pulls it but slaps it straight into Harbhajan's hands
tosses this up - another very slow ball - and Swann tries to work it to leg but is bowled!
survives the hat-trick and tickles it fine - very fine stroke. He's timed it well, too, but not quite well enough to get four
what's gone wrong here! Singh - down the leg side, and short fine-leg has made a complete hash of things to let through five wides! That was Yuvraj's mess-up at short fine-leg
outside off - oh well bowled! A dot ball with which to finish
